sentences.en: CtBP 2 is a transcription repressor targeting diverse transcription factors.
sentences.cn: CtBP2是一种针对多种转录物的辅阻遏因子.

sentences.en: DNA molecule to RNA polymerase binds, initiating the transcription of RNA.
sentences.cn: 一种rna模板上的dna形成的聚合酶, 尤其在逆转录酶病毒中发现.

sentences.en: Ebola virus GP and VP 30 are essential activators of viral transcription.
sentences.cn: 埃博拉病毒蛋白GP和VP30是病毒重要的转录因子.

sentences.en: Histones are characterized by numerous posttranslational modifications that influence gene transcription.
sentences.cn: 组蛋白的特点是大量的翻译后修饰,这些修饰可以影响基因转录.

sentences.en: I have had much practice in transcription.
sentences.cn: 我在抄写方面有过很多锻炼.

sentences.en: In contrast, 60 % of the transcription factor genes are retained as duplicates.
sentences.cn: 与此形成鲜明对照的是加倍区段的转录因子保留了60%的姊妹基因.

sentences.en: Jazz is essentially an art of performance rather than of transcription.
sentences.cn: 爵士音乐基本上是一种表演艺术而不是乐曲改编艺术.

sentences.en: Methods Reverse transcription - polymerase chain reaction ( RT - PCR ), and immunohistochemical method were used.
sentences.cn: 方法采用反转录 - 聚合酶链反应 ( RT -PCR ) 法和免疫组织化学方法.

sentences.en: Pronunciation is shown by a system of phonetic transcription.
sentences.cn: 发音通过一种音标系统标示出来。

sentences.en: So far, the mechanism of Aire regulating transcription is still unknown.
sentences.cn: 然而Aire调节转录的确切机制及Aire的靶基因还不清楚.

sentences.en: The chromatin remodeling and histone acetylation were associated with transcription activation.
sentences.cn: 真核基因活化与染色质的重建及组蛋白的乙酰化相关.

sentences.en: The transcription of words into phonetic symbols requires special training.
sentences.cn: 给单词注音标需要特殊的训练.

sentences.en: Thus, oxidative DNA damage adversely affects transcription and DNA replication in melanocytes.
sentences.cn: 这样氧化损伤的DNA负性影响黑色素细胞的转录和DNA复制.

sentences.en: Today, I learned a phonetic transcription 48, and a few words.
sentences.cn: 今天我学了48个音标, 和几个单词.

sentences.en: Transcription factors are key regulatory elements that control gene expression.
sentences.cn: 转录因子是调控基因表达的重要调控元件.

words.tran_cn: 成绩单；抄本，副本；文字记录
（美）直接根据录音打字的打字员

trans.tran_en: an exact written or printed copy of something
